lines.text: You can't have someone of Susan's talent teaching village children their five-finger exercises. It would be like harnessing a race horse to a farm cart.
Ah there you are Mr Thorne. A most interesting afternoon. There were admirable things in your discourse.
But we must see that you have a wastepaper basket with you in the pulpit next time.
If I get that scholarship, nothing's going to stop me.
That's what I was waiting to hear!
Do you believe that life is a veil of tears? I do not!
I think that was the first time in my life that I've preached to any effect.
They say that when you've come to terms with death, you've come to terms with life also.
